snippet: Since 2006, when HCA was taken private in a leveraged buyout, profits at its acute-care hospitals have soared. Total margin, a measure of financial performance, has remained far higher at HCA hospitals than at other similar institutions.
lead_paragraph: Since 2006, when HCA was taken private in a leveraged buyout, profits at its acute-care hospitals have soared. Total margin, a measure of financial performance, has remained far higher at HCA hospitals than at other similar institutions.
